---
title: "Implementation of EL model and student achievement"
author: "Joe Ciesielski"
date: "9/12/2018"
output: pdf_document

---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      fig.width = 10,
                      fig.asp = 0.618,
                      fig.align = "center")

library(tidyverse)
library(jtcr)
library(here)
library(corrplot)

el_dat <- read_csv(here::here("data/tidied_data.csv"))

el_dat <- el_dat %>% 
  mutate(
    school_dist_diff = school - district,
    ir_diff = ir_score - ir_target
  )
```



```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

el_dat %>% 
  distinct(school_name, .keep_all = TRUE) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(school, ir_target)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth()
```


```{r}
r <- cor(el_dat[c(7,8,10,11,13,14)], use = "pairwise.complete.obs")

corrplot(r)
```

```{r}
ggplot(el_dat, aes(school, ir_diff)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth()

```
